attributes.action: Ban smoking in cars when children are passengers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Passive smoking is proven to be bad for everyone, especially children. [1] Secondhand smoke gets concentrated inside a car. 

In the spirit of the UN Convention on the Rights of the Child, and in the name of common sense, let's reduce the exposure of children to secondhand smoke by banning smoking in cars when children are passengers.

[1] "...environmental tobacco smoke is a significant public health risk to young children" (Extract from the 1997 Declaration of the Environment Leaders of the Eight (G8)* on Children's Environmental Health.)
